verses.roman:
patra pāñā viprera haila ānandita mana
prabhura caraṇe dhari' karaye krandana

synonyms: patra pāñā—getting the leaves; viprera—of the brāhmaṇa; haila—there was; ānandita—pleased; mana—mind; prabhura caraṇe—the lotus feet of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhari'-taking; karaye—does; krandana—crying.
translation: Rāmadāsa Vipra was very much pleased to receive the original leaf manuscript of the Kūrma Purāṇa, and he immediately fell down before the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and began to cry.
